name: My Universe: My Baby Dragon
storyline: As a new dragon care taker, you’ll be in charge of your very own nursery. Whatever its element (water, air, fire or earth) your baby dragon will need a lot of love and attention to grow and flourish. You’ll have to be attentive to their needs in order to provide them with their favorite treats. Watch them hatch and help them grow their magic skills, showering them with cuddles and sweets until they take off for the Dragon School. Only the best care takers capable of increasing their magic knowledge will gain the dragon’s trust and maybe even become their friend!
summary: Raise baby dragons and teach them their elemental magic! Our little friends need you to help them spread their wings! From their hatching stage to the moment they’ll be able to fly on their own, take care of your baby Dragons and help them enter the marvelous Dragons’ school! Fly off for an enchanting adventure full of magic and become the best Dragonward of all time!
